meanings.sent1: She walked stumblingly over the rocky path.
meanings.sent2: He tripped and stumbled stumblingly down the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The puppy tried stumblingly to climb onto the couch.
meanings.sent4: The old car moved stumblingly along the bumpy road.
meanings.sent5: The toddler moved stumblingly as he learned to walk.

meanings.sent1: She spoke stumblingly as she tried to remember the answer.
meanings.sent2: He stumbled stumblingly through his speech, nervous in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The student stumbled stumblingly through the math problem, unsure of the solution.
meanings.sent4: The singer stumbled stumblingly over the unfamiliar lyrics.
meanings.sent5: The hiker moved stumblingly up the steep mountain trail.
